column4: Tesla burns cash  loses more than $4 000 on every car sold
column5: The Silicon Valley automaker is losing more than $4 000 on every Model S electric sedan it sells  using its reckoning of operating losses  and it burned $359 million in cash last quarter in a bull market for luxury vehicles. The company on Wednesday cut its production targets for this year and next. Chief Executive Elon Musk said he's considering options to raise more capital  and didn't rule out selling more stock. | Video

column4: RPT - INSIGHT-Tesla burns cash  loses more than $4 000 on every car sold
column5: DETROIT  Aug 9 It's crunch time for Tesla Motors .
